languages.text: Обстоятельства смерти Ксавьера Калькасара скрыты. Поговаривают, что Лорд-инквизитор был убит на поединке Ангелом Императора. Повергнув почтенного инквизитора, тот выкрикнул ему в лицо имена братьев, а затем растоптал голову сабатоном.

The circumstances of Xavier Calcazar's death are not known. It is rumoured that the Lord Inquisitor was slain in a duel by an Angel of the Emperor, who shouted the names of his brothers in the Inquisitor's face and then stamped on his head with a sabaton.
languages.original_text: Обстоятельства смерти Ксавьера Калькасара скрыты. Поговаривают, что Лорд-инквизитор был убит на поединке Ангелом Императора. Повергнув почтенного инквизитора, тот выкрикнул ему в лицо имена братьев, а затем растоптал голову сабатоном.

languages.text: 希维尔·卡尔卡扎的死因尚不清楚。据传言称，大审判官是在决斗中被帝皇的天使杀死的。那个天使当着大审判官的面，高喊着他兄弟们的名字，之后猛地一脚踏在在大审判官头上，把他活活踩死了。
languages.original_text: The circumstances of Xavier Calcazar's death are not known. It is rumoured that the Lord Inquisitor was slain in a duel by an Angel of the Emperor, who shouted the names of his brothers in the Inquisitor's face and then stamped on his head with a sabaton.

traits.locale_text: 希维尔·卡尔卡扎的死因尚不清楚。据传言称，审判长是在决斗中被帝皇的天使杀死的。那个天使当着审判长的面，高喊着他兄弟们的名字，之后猛地一脚踏在在审判长头上，把他活活踩死了。

languages.text: ザビエル・カルカサルの死の状況は不明だ。噂では、ロード・インクィジターは皇帝の天使との決闘で虐殺されたということだ。天使は彼の兄弟の名を異端審問官の面前で叫び、足の装甲鋼板で頭を踏み潰したらしい。
languages.original_text: The circumstances of Xavier Calcazar's death are not known. It is rumoured that the Lord Inquisitor was slain in a duel by an Angel of the Emperor, who shouted the names of his brothers in the Inquisitor's face and then stamped on his head with a sabaton.

traits.locale_text: ザビエル・カルカサルの死の状況は不明だ。噂では、ロード・インクィジターは皇帝の天使との決闘で虐殺されたということだ。天使は彼の兄弟の名を異端審問官の面前で叫び、足の装甲鋼板で頭を踏み潰したらしい。

languages.text: On ignore les circonstances de la mort de Xavier Calcazar. Le seigneur inquisiteur aurait péri lors d'un duel contre un ange de l'Empereur, qui hurla les noms de ses frères au visage de l'inquisiteur avant de lui écraser la tête sous son soleret.
languages.original_text: The circumstances of Xavier Calcazar's death are not known. It is rumoured that the Lord Inquisitor was slain in a duel by an Angel of the Emperor, who shouted the names of his brothers in the Inquisitor's face and then stamped on his head with a sabaton.

traits.locale_text: On ignore les circonstances de la mort de Xavier Calcazar. Le seigneur inquisiteur aurait péri lors d'un duel contre un ange de l'Empereur, qui hurla les noms de ses frères au visage de l'inquisiteur avant de lui écraser la tête sous son soleret.

languages.text: No se conocen las circunstancias que rodearon a la muerte de Xavier Calcazar. Se rumorea que el Lord Inquisidor murió en un duelo con un Ángel del Emperador que gritó los nombres de sus hermanos en la cara de Calcazar antes de destrozarle la cabeza con una porra.
languages.original_text: The circumstances of Xavier Calcazar's death are not known. It is rumoured that the Lord Inquisitor was slain in a duel by an Angel of the Emperor, who shouted the names of his brothers in the Inquisitor's face and then stamped on his head with a sabaton.

traits.locale_text: No se conocen las circunstancias que rodearon a la muerte de Xavier Calcazar. Se rumorea que el Lord Inquisidor murió en un duelo con un Ángel del Emperador que gritó los nombres de sus hermanos en la cara de Calcazar antes de destrozarle la cabeza con una porra.

languages.text: Die Umstände von Xavier Calcazars Tod sind nicht bekannt. Angeblich wurde der Großinquisitor im Duell von einem Engel des Imperators getötet, der dem Inquisitor die Namen seiner Brüder ins Gesicht brüllte und dann mit einem Eisenschuh seinen Kopf zerstampfte.
languages.original_text: The circumstances of Xavier Calcazar's death are not known. It is rumoured that the Lord Inquisitor was slain in a duel by an Angel of the Emperor, who shouted the names of his brothers in the Inquisitor's face and then stamped on his head with a sabaton.

traits.locale_text: Die Umstände von Xavier Calcazars Tod sind nicht bekannt. Angeblich wurde der Großinquisitor im Duell von einem Engel des Imperators getötet, der dem Inquisitor die Namen seiner Brüder ins Gesicht brüllte und dann mit einem Eisenschuh seinen Kopf zerstampfte.

languages.text: Xavier Calcazar'ın ölümüne neyin sebep olduğu bilinmiyor. Lord Engizisyoncu'nun İmparator'un Meleği ile düello yaparak öldüğüne; Melek'in, Engizisyoncu'nun yüzüne kardeşlerinin adını haykırdığına ve ardından başını ayağıyla ezdiğine dair söylentiler mevcut.
languages.original_text: The circumstances of Xavier Calcazar's death are not known. It is rumoured that the Lord Inquisitor was slain in a duel by an Angel of the Emperor, who shouted the names of his brothers in the Inquisitor's face and then stamped on his head with a sabaton.

traits.locale_text: Xavier Calcazar'ın ölümüne neyin sebep olduğu bilinmiyor. Lord Engizisyoncu'nun İmparator'un bir Melek'i ile düello yaparak öldüğüne; Melek'in, Engizisyoncu'nun yüzüne kardeşlerinin adını haykırdığına ve ardından başını ayağıyla ezdiğine dair söylentiler mevcut.
